org.ensembl.variation.datamodel
Interface VariationGroup

All Superinterfaces:
Persistent, java.io.Serializable
public interface VariationGroup
extends Persistent

Grouping of variations (aka haplotype set). A grouping of variations that have tight linkage. This is commonly known as a Haplotype Set. It can be viewed as a vertical grouping of AlleleGroups.

Author:
Craig Melsopp
